title: Darts
content:
Darts in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Darts are Two-Handed, Finesse, Simple Ranged Weapons in BG3 that can only be two-handed, dealing 1-4 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 18m, and they deal Piercing Damage. though some special Battleaxes also deal another type of Damage as well. Being a Ranged Weapon, note that you have disadvantage on attack rolls with Darts while Threatened.

Man
